long_description: . Author: Bruce Grubbs. Softcover; 275 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Sasquatch Books; copyright 2012. Includes trail ratings from worthwhile to spectacular on a scale of 1 to 5; ratings are based on water features, vistas, privacy and other enjoyment factors. At-a-glance information includes recommended seasons, permit and parking fees, distance, elevation gain and estimated hiking times. Topographical maps and concise descriptions give you a detailed preview of the trail. .
short_description: The Creaky Knees Guide: Arizona offers 80 day hikes compiled for the hiker that wants to take it easy.
